text: Ra musale bhaneh he palanakarta! Timile phira'auna ra tyasaka nayakaharula'i sansarika jivanama (prasasta) sobhaniya samagri, dhana sampatti di'eka chau, he palanakarta! Yasto yasalagi ki timro sahi batobata vicalita garun, he palanakarta! Yiniharuka dhana sampattila'i nasta paride'u, ra yiniharuko hrdayala'i kathora bana'ide'u, jasabata yiniharule imana lya'una napa'un yahamsam'ma ki kastadayaka sajaya dekhun
